I run KSP fine as long as I keep the total parts count below 400.

Between 400-500 it gets a bit laggy, but I can push that to 500-600 if I run my Game Booster program, which pauses or kills most windows background programs and gives priority to the game I am running. But KSP doesn't use more than 4gb of RAM anyway so it doesn't really load my computer much. And there is a slight memory leak in it or in one of the plugins. I may do some testing after .22 to see if I can find it.

For those of you who are having lag issues in game and are using a Nvidia card, you can set it to run the physics instead of graphics.
